name: QuickLiteAdmin
short_description: QuickLiteAdmin is a new database administration system for embedded SQLite database files. You can access databases stored localy, upload them or even download from specified URL. QLA is written in PHP (works with PHP4/5) requires SQLite support(v2.8.x)
